thread.title: London Mayor Boris Johnson clobbers young Japanese boy while playing touch rugby
thread.title_full: London Mayor Boris Johnson clobbers young Japanese boy while playing touch rugby

title: London Mayor Boris Johnson clobbers young Japanese boy while playing touch rugby
text:
London Mayor Boris Johnson clobbers young Japanese boy while playing touch rugby Resize Text By Matt Bonesteel October 15 at 7:18 AM Follow @MattBonesteel (Issei Kato/Reuters) 
London Mayor Boris Johnson is in Japan on a trade visit, and on Thursday he joined some youngsters in a game of supposedly non-contact rugby, in which the ball is stopped when the carrier is touched, not tackled. 
Yeah, well …. 
— MonsterBet (@Monster_Bet) October 15, 2015 
Don’t worry, 10-year-old Toki Sekiguchi is okay, telling the BBC that he only “felt a little pain.” Johnson apologized and shook Toki’s hand. After spending the first 17 years of his Post career writing and editing, Matt and the printed paper had an amicable divorce in 2014. He's now blogging and editing for the Early Lead and the Post's other Web-based products. sports Success! Check your inbox for details.
